Subject: Shockwave & Unitron
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave/Unitron:




The two Neo Decepticon space fighters greatly decreased their altitudes and 
armed their weapons.

"I'm detecting Maximal signature...and I've spotted them.  Kill them?"

"No, for now aid the Chivtrons.  We are greatly outnumbered and it would be a 
tactical error to engage such superior numbers." Shockwave advised, firing 
off tenr apid laser bolts from the nosecone of his current mode at McGowan.

"Fine.  If I must." Unitron remarked, firing off five rapid laser bolts from 
his nosecone weapon at Depp.
